oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Tintype of Confederate cavalryman Dock Monroe Smith
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Tintype of Dock Monroe Smith (1841-1926). Smith fought for the Confederacy as a sergeant with Co. C, Holman's Battalion, Tenn. Partisan Rangers and then with Co. E, 11th Tenn. Cav. Regt. He served under Gen. Nathan Bedford Forrest, participating in Forrest's pursuit across north Ala. for Col. Abel D. Streight, but was wounded before Streight was captured.
